job.title: Site Reliability Engineer (Remote)
job.description:
Does Artificial Intelligence excite you? It excites us! CallMiner's award-winning software empowers organizations to extract intelligence from customer interactions, including calls, chat, and social platforms in order to provide our customers with actionable steps to improve all aspects of their business. With a cutting-edge product, we are proud to have been named a leader in the industry by Forrester.
In order to meet our mission of being the best in our industry, we hire only the best people and challenge them every day. CallMiner team members are passionate about delivering innovative technology solutions and industry-leading customer success. Among other things, Joy is one of our core values and we strive to ensure our employees find happiness and satisfaction in their work every day.
CallMiner is growing rapidly and expanding into new verticals and countries. To hear more about what it's like to work at CallMiner, watch our video at Careers.CallMiner.com
Summary
CallMiner is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our DevOps department. Site Reliability Engineer Engineers design and implement solutions to streamline deployment and post-deployment activities. Collaborate with developers and Operations to design, build, and implement platform metrics, automation, and monitoring for numerous systems. Aid in troubleshooting and triaging of issues to enrich overall experience for internal and external stakeholders.
Requirements
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Network Administration, or equivalent work experience
2+ years of relevant SRE or DevOps experience as part of an IT or Enterprise SaaS company.
Experience with Microsoft SQL Server
Experience with Windows and Linux operating system environments
Experience with PowerShell, Python, or related scripting
Experience programming to RESTful APIs
Experience setting up, maintaining, and troubleshooting Docker, Kubernetes, and/or cloud deployment technologies
Ability to demonstrate expertise when troubleshooting and solving complex problems
Experience with MongoDB or non-relational databases a plus
Experience with AWS and/or Azure technologies a plus
Experience with RabbitMQ a plus
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain critical data extraction and reporting systems that provide in-depth analysis and monitoring.
Frequent collaboration with Operations and Development departments to gather requirements, design, test, and implement tooling and automation.
Troubleshoot deployment or system issues and work with necessary teams to resolve them.
Pro-actively grow into role of a technical SME with CallMiner products and technologies to assist and provide solutions to departments across the organization.
Provides direct and responsive support for analytic requests.
Ability to perform in a fast-paced environment while managing multiple systems and frequent releases to those systems.
Ability to drive multiple projects simultaneously while providing excellent customer-service to the various stakeholders.
Benefits
Medical, Dental & Vision
Our BCBS plan offers high quality and affordable Medical coverage with a gap plan to help offset the deductible.
Keep your smile bright and your eyes seeing clearly.
Fitness Reimbursement
A Fitness Reimbursement program to help employees take a proactive approach to their health with fitness and exercise programs.
Life Insurance & Disability
We provide Basic Life Insurance at no cost to you as well as offer voluntary Supplemental Life Insurance for you, spouse and children. Our disability plans are designed to help protect your financial security in the event you are ever disabled.
Flexible Spending Accounts
Our Flex Spending Accounts allow you to set aside pre-tax dollars for your health and dependent care expenses.
401k
CallMiner values the importance of saving for retirement. We offer both Traditional and Roth 401k options, as well as a 401k match.
Paid Time Off (PTO)
CallMiner offers generous time off for you to recharge your batteries with plenty of PTO time and 12 paid holidays.
Other Benefits
Paid Maternity Leave and Parental Leave
Employee referral program
Commuter Benefits
Employee Assistance Program
A Healthyme rewards program to earn up to $400 a year with the BCBS health plan
Voluntary Benefits
Accident Insurance
Identity Theft Protection
Legal Shield
Pet Insurance
